Asụsụ Karang (a na-akpọkwa Mbum East ma ọ bụ Lakka) bụ asụsụ Mbum nke Cameroon na Chad.
..Enwere ndị na-asụ Karang 27,000 - 32,000 na Cameroon, gụnyere 7,000 ndị na-asụ olumba Sakpu (SIL 1991), na ndị na-asụ 10,000-15,000 nke olumba Nzakmbay (SIL 1998)
A na-asụ Karang na obodo Touboro na Tcholliré na ngalaba Mayo-Rey, Northern Region yana Chad
Ọ na Pana nwere njikọ chiri anya.
Egosiri nasalisation na cedilla : a̧, ȩ, i̧, o̧, ɔ̧, u̧.
Naanị ụda dị elu, e ji olu dị egwu gosi ya: á, é, í, ó, ɔ́, ú;  a pụrụ ijikọta ya na nasalisation: á̧, ȩ́, í̧, ó̧, ú̧.￼
